decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Combo - Transmogrify archetype, which involves using cards like Transmogrify to turn a token creature into a game-winning bomb like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn or another powerful creature. The deck also includes support cards like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to help set up the combo, as well as removal spells like Fatal Push and Heartless Act to control the board. The companion, Jegantha, the Wellspring, can provide additional mana acceleration and support.

The deck focuses on disruptive spells and hand control to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while also using cards like Waste Not to generate advantage from discarding cards. The win condition of the deck is to ultimately grind the opponent out of resources with cards like Liliana of the Veil and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, while also using removal spells like Fatal Push to maintain board control. The deck also includes a mana base that supports the control strategy and allows for various utility lands to be utilized for additional benefits.
